title: Front-End Development
description: I learnt to use HTML, CSS and Tailwind/Bootstrap in order to realize this website or personal projects. I also know how to use React and NodeJS.

title: Back-End Development
description: I acquired knowledge in SQL and NO-SQL databases during my cursus at school, I can also use Express and manage REST APIs in a MERN structure. I was also able to use .NET and MVC Model at Faurecia.

title: Software Development
description: I learned multiple languages during my scholarity, as you will see on my projects, such as : C#, C++ (and C), Python and Java.

title: Electronics
description: I learnt to program a STM32 ship and it was part of an important project in school, but I can also use Arduino and Eagle softwares.

title: Unity Engine
description: Unity is my main software at work, we use it in order to manipulate 3D models on real-time and create CAD softwares in VR.

title: GitHub
description: I use Git and GitHub a lot : school, work, personal projects. It is a really useful tool that I am glad to know. I use it as a DevOps tool when it's not Azure DevOps.
